# Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct | 贡献者公约行为准则

## Our Pledge | 我们的承诺

We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone.

作为成员、贡献者和领导者，我们承诺让每个人都能在无骚扰的环境中参与社区活动。

## Our Standards | 我们的标准

**Positive behavior | 积极行为：**
- Using welcoming and inclusive language | 使用友好和包容的语言
- Being respectful of differing viewpoints | 尊重不同观点
- Gracefully accepting constructive criticism | 优雅地接受建设性批评
- Focusing on what is best for the community | 关注社区的最佳利益

**Unacceptable behavior | 不可接受的行为：**
- Harassment, trolling, or insulting comments | 骚扰、挑衅或侮辱性评论
- Public or private harassment | 公开或私下骚扰
- Publishing others' private information | 发布他人私人信息

## Enforcement | 执行

Instances of abusive behavior may be reported to the project team. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated promptly and fairly.

可向项目团队举报滥用行为。所有投诉将被及时、公正地审查和调查。

## Attribution | 归属

This Code of Conduct is adapted from the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org), version 2.1.

本行为准则改编自 [贡献者公约](https://www.contributor-covenant.org) 2.1 版。
